column3: News;Phnom Penh:  Capital Hall has requested that all Khan and Sangkats monitor and take strict measures  against advertising stickers and banners distributed about the city. ------Fines shall be issued against offenders
column4: and serious cases will be sent to court.------Ms. Chanthok Sokuntha
column6: said that the Phnom Penh Municipal administration disseminated instructions and notifications after a meeting on Wednesday. Capital Hall asked companies which advertise without permission to remove such adverts and cease from putting up more.------https://kohsantepheapdaily.com.kh/article/712840.html
